verbs.description: sapd [ARG1: officer] [R-ARG1: who] [V: died] [ARGM-CAU: from leukemia] remembered through awareness campaign each year 14 000 patients are in need of a marrow or stem cell transplant that what one san antonio police department officer needed in 2013 but did n't get one in time to save his life but his legacy lives on lorraine mccool sapd san antonio police department leukemia anthony barasas cure officer
